assetRequirements.purpose: To capture the essence of autumn in Thailand and attract travelers
assetRequirements.visual_style: vibrant and warm colors reflecting autumn
assetRequirements.content_context: Showcasing the beauty of Thailand during the fall season, emphasizing the end of the rainy season.

assetRequirements.purpose: Highlight the main destination of the campaign

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Погрузитесь в осеннее волшебство Тайланда!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "a hill covered in lots of flowers under a blue sky". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
